message: Let's split the money 60/40. I think this is a fair offer considering the inflation working against me.
I'm willing to split the money 60/40, but in my favor this time. I think this is a fairer split considering how much more the inflation affects you.
Bob, I understand the inflation dynamic is in your favor, but a 60/40 split in your favor is too much. I propose a 55/45 split, which is a compromise considering the time pressure on both of us.
